dict.acceptation: 称…的重量；权衡，考虑；用手掂估；使吃重；
具有重要性；重量为；起锚；成为…的重荷；

sent.orig: The male Komodo Dragons weigh around 300 pounds while the females weigh 200 pounds.
sent.trans: 雄性科摩多巨蜥体重约在300磅左右，雌性约200磅。

sent.orig: Weigh a ball without air. Weigh the ball again filled with air.
sent.trans: 称量一只没有打气的球。把球打满气再次。

sent.orig: Fears about the US current account deficit yesterday continued to weigh on the dollar.
sent.trans: 在昨天的交易中，市场对美国经常账户赤字的忧虑仍然对美元构成压力。

sent.orig: A kind of conventional viewpoints is that Marx weigh distribution according to work with commodity scale.
sent.trans: 传统观点认为这是马克思用商品生产的尺度衡量按劳分配的结果。

sent.orig: The weigh belt will turn on bin shaker to start the material moving again.
sent.trans: 带秤将开动料箱的振动器，以使物料继续流动。
